record.title: FIRST HIGHER EDUCATION EXTENSION ACT OF 2007

speaking.paragraph: Madam Speaker, I ask unanimous consent to take from the Speaker's table the Senate bill (S. 1704) to temporarily extend the programs under the Higher Education Act of 1965, and for other purposes, and ask for its immediate consideration in the House.

record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the Senate bill.
record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentleman from New York?
record.narrative: The Clerk read the Senate bill, as follows:
